Question: This person was a member of an early underground comedy ensemble called Channel One which he co-founded in 1967.
Hints: This person's early film roles included Tunnel Vision, Foul Play, and Oh Heavenly Dog.
This person is a graduate of the Stockbridge School in Stockbridge, Massachusetts.
